title: Die Legende der WÃ¤chter
description: Soren, a young barn owl, is kidnapped by owls of St. Aggie's, ostensibly an orphanage, where owlets are brainwashed into becoming soldiers. He and his new friends escape to the island of Ga'Hoole, to assist its noble, wise owls who fight the army being created by the wicked rulers of St. Aggie's. Written by Anonymous
castList: [Emily Barclay, Abbie Cornish, Essie Davis, Adrienne DeFaria, Joel Edgerton, Deborra-Lee Furness, Sacha Horler, Bill Hunter, Ryan Kwanten, Anthony LaPaglia, Miriam Margolyes, Helen Mirren, Sam Neill, Barry Otto, Richard Roxburgh]
characterList: [Gylfie (voice), Otulissa (voice), Marella (voice), Eglantine (voice), Metal Beak (voice), Barran (voice), Strix Struma (voice), Bubo (voice), Kludd (voice), Twilight (voice), Mrs. Plithiver (voice), Nyra (voice), Allomere (voice), Echidna (voice), Boron (voice)]
